p: In a 30-day survival study, Rhodiola imbricata (Fig. 27) was found to be maximally effective at 400 mg/kg b.wt. administered 30 min prior to 10 Gy exposure in strain ‘A’ Swiss albino mice model system, 1000 mg/Kg b.wt. indicating the non-toxic behaviour of the extract (Arora et al. 2005a, 2008a, c, d; Chawla et al. 2010).
